title: get rid of mana items in aram?
body:
like whats the point, at least come mid game.
not so much the items themselves but do something to make mana items more worth while
except the ones that already are

replies.body: Then get rid of life steal and {{item:3083}} and {{champion:37}}

all I'm saying is there is ample mana regen from the mode I find you benefit less from mana in aram than you would in SR. 

maybe a better approach might be to have mana regen by backing to base, not hp regen of course.

I love how ppls makes mages and enchanters to be a big issue in aram all the time because they aren't and never were. You cannot win with 5 mages against team that has one tank or few fighters who will build lifesteal+mr. Yes first levels are obnoxious but at 3 items it turns aroundÂ´completely and mages cannot do anything.

On top of that, we've been already given {{summoner:39}} as a counter to the all ranged/poke teams (and it is main reason I no longer enjoy this mode personally) so what more you want?
if we get rid of mana items then make all spells free.
let's just remove everything til the only champ left is Ashe and the only item is Thornmail
